00014 #ifndef U_MIME_ENTITY_H
00015 #define U_MIME_ENTITY_H 1

00020 
00021 // UMimeEntity -- class representing a MIME entity
00022 //
00023 // RFC-2045 defines an entity as either a message or a body part, both of which have a collection of headers and a body
00024 //
00025 // MIME headers comprise a keyword followed by ":" followed by whitespace and the value.
00026 // If a line begins with whitespace it is a continuation of the preceeding line.
00027 // MIME headers are delimited by an empty line
00028 //
00029 // The only reliable way to determine the type of body is to access the Content-Type header field from the
00030 // headers object of the entity that contains it. For this reason, a body should always be part of a entity.
00031 // Only types "multipart" and "message" need to be parsed, and in all content types, the body contains a
00032 // string of characters
00033 //
00034 // If the content type is 'message'   then the body contains an encapsulated message
00035 // If the content type is 'multipart' then the body contains one or more body parts
00036 
00037 class UMimeMultipart;
00038 
00039 class U_EXPORT UMimeEntity {
00040 public:
00041 
00042         // Check for memory error
00043         U_MEMORY_TEST
00044 
00045         // Allocator e Deallocator
00046         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00047         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00048 
00049         UMimeEntity();
00050         UMimeEntity(const UString& _data, uint32_t startHeader = 0);
00051 
00052         UMimeEntity(UMimeEntity& item) : data(item.data), body(item.body), content_type(item.content_type), content(item.content)
00053                 {
00054                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeEntity, "%p", &item)
00055 
00056                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(item.header)
00057 
00058                 endHeader   = item.endHeader;
00059                 startHeader = item.startHeader;
00060                 // passaggio di consegne...
00061                 header      = item.header;
00062                                                   item.header = 0;
00063                 }
00064 
00065         ~UMimeEntity();
00066 
00067         // VARIE
00068 
00069         UMimeHeader* getHeader() const { return header; }
00070 
00071         void setEmpty()
00072                 {
00073                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::setEmpty()")
00074 
00075                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(header)
00076 
00077                 data.setEmpty();
00078 
00079                 header->clear();
00080                 }
00081 
00082         bool parse();
00083         bool parse(const UString& _data)
00084                 {
00085                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::parse(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(_data))
00086 
00087                 U_ASSERT(data.empty() == true)
00088 
00089                 data = _data;
00090 
00091                 (void) parse();
00092 
00093                 U_RETURN(parse_result);
00094                 }
00095 
00096         bool isParsingOk()
00097                 {
00098                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::isParsingOk()")
00099 
00100                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(header)
00101 
00102                 U_RETURN(parse_result);
00103                 }
00104 
00105         UString getData() const        { return data; }
00106         UString getBody() const        { return body; }
00107         UString getContent() const     { return content; }
00108         UString getContentType() const { return content_type; }
00109         UString getMimeVersion() const { return header->getMimeVersion(); }
00110 
00111         // Content types: "multipart"   / [ "mixed", "alternative", "digest", "parallel", "signed", "encrypted", "report", "form-data" ],
00112         //                "message"     / [ "rfc822", "disposition-notification" ],
00113         //                "image"       / [ "jpeg", "gif" ],
00114         //                "audio"       / [ "basic" ],
00115         //                "video"       / [ "mpeg" ],
00116         //                "application" / [ "postscript", "octet-stream", "pgp-signature", "pgp-encrypted", "pgp-clearsigned",
00117         //                                  "pkcs7-signature", "pkcs7-mime", "ms-tnef", "x-www-form-urlencoded" ]
00118         //                "text"        / [ "plain" (RFC-1521), "richtext" (RFC-1341), "enriched", "html", "xvcard", "vcal",
00119         //                                  "rtf", "xml" ],
00120 
00121         bool isMime() { return header->isMime(); }
00122 
00123         bool isXML() const;
00124         bool isText() const;
00125         bool isPKCS7() const;
00126         bool isRFC822() const;
00127         bool isMessage() const;
00128         bool isMultipart() const;
00129         bool isURLEncoded() const;
00130         bool isApplication() const;
00131         bool isMultipartFormData() const;
00132 
00133         UString getCharSet() const                       { return UMimeHeader::getCharSet(content_type); } // get charset/content-type info
00134         UString shortContentType() const  { return UMimeHeader::shortContentType(content_type); }
00135 
00136         UString getValueAttributeFromKey(const UString& key, const UString& name) const
00137                 { return header->getValueAttributeFromKey(key, name); }
00138 
00139         bool isType(       const char* type, uint32_t len) const { return UMimeHeader::isType(       content_type, type, len); }
00140         bool isContentType(const char* type, uint32_t len) const { return UMimeHeader::isContentType(content_type, type, len); }
00141 
00142         // Disposition type (Content-Disposition header field, see RFC-1806): "inline", "attachment"
00143 
00144         UString getContentDisposition() const { return header->getContentDisposition(); }
00145 
00146         bool isAttachment() const
00147                 {
00148                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::isAttachment()")
00149 
00150                 UString value = getContentDisposition();
00151 
00152                 bool result = (value.empty()                                                              == false &&
00153                                                         U_STRING_FIND(value, 0, "attachment") != U_NOT_FOUND);
00154 
00155                 U_RETURN(result);
00156                 }
00157 
00158         bool isBodyMessage() const
00159                 {
00160                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::isBodyMessage()")
00161 
00162                 bool result = (isText()                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         &&
00163                                                         UMimeHeader::getValueAttributeFromKeyValue(content_type, *UMimeHeader::str_name, false).empty() &&
00164                                                         isAttachment() == false);
00165 
00166                 U_RETURN(result);
00167                 }
00168 
00169         UString getFileName() const { return UMimeHeader::getFileName(getContentDisposition()); }
00170 
00171         // retrieve information on specific HTML form elements
00172         // (such as checkboxes, radio buttons, and text fields)
00173         // as couple <name1>=<value1>&<name2>=<value2>&...
00174 
00175         uint32_t getNameValueFormData(UVector<UString>& name_value) const
00176                 {
00177                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::getNameValueFormData(%p)", &name_value)
00178 
00179                 U_ASSERT(header->empty() == false)
00180                 U_ASSERT(content.empty() == false)
00181 
00182                 // Standard content type: "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"
00183                 // It may not be explicitly specified
00184 
00185                 U_ASSERT(content_type.empty() || isURLEncoded())
00186 
00187                 return UStringExt::getNameValueFromData(content, name_value);
00188                 }
00189 
00190         // read with socket
00191 
00192         bool readBody(USocket* socket);
00193         bool readHeader(USocket* socket);
00194 
00195         // STREAM
00196 
00197         friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const UMimeEntity& e)
00198                 {
00199                 U_TRACE(0+256, "UMimeEntity::operator<<(%p,%p)", &os, &e)
00200 
00201                 os << *(e.header);
00202 
00203                 os.write(e.body.data(), e.body.size());
00204 
00205                 return os;
00206                 }
00207 
00208         // DEBUG
00209 
00210 #ifdef DEBUG
00211         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00212 #endif
00213 
00214 protected:
00215         UMimeHeader* header;
00216         uint32_t startHeader, endHeader;
00217         UString data, body, content_type, content;
00218         bool parse_result;
00219 
00220         void clear()
00221                 {
00222                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::clear()")
00223 
00224                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(header)
00225 
00226                 delete header;
00227                                  header = 0;
00228                 }
00229 
00230         bool checkContentType()
00231                 {
00232                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::checkContentType()")
00233 
00234                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(header)
00235 
00236                 content_type = header->getContentType();
00237 
00238                 bool result = (content_type.empty() == false);
00239 
00240                 U_RETURN(result);
00241                 }
00242 
00243         void decodeBody();
00244 
00245 private:
00246         UMimeEntity& operator=(const UMimeEntity&) { return *this; }
00247 
00248         friend class UMimeMultipart;
00249 };

00251 // If the content type is 'message' then the body contains an encapsulated message.
00252 
00253 class U_EXPORT UMimeMessage : public UMimeEntity {
00254 public:
00255 
00256         // COSTRUTTORI
00257 
00258         UMimeMessage(UMimeEntity& item) : UMimeEntity(item), rfc822(content)
00259                 {
00260                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeMessage, "%p", &item)
00261 
00262                 U_ASSERT(UMimeEntity::isMessage())
00263                 }
00264 
00265         UMimeMessage(const UString& _data) : UMimeEntity(_data), rfc822(content)
00266                 {
00267                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeMessage, "%.*S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(_data))
00268                 }
00269 
00270         ~UMimeMessage()
00271                 {
00272                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeMessage)
00273                 }
00274 
00275         // VARIE
00276 
00277         UMimeEntity& getRFC822() { return rfc822; }
00278 
00279         // STREAM
00280 
00281         friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const UMimeMessage& m)
00282                 {
00283                 U_TRACE(0+256, "UMimeMessage::operator<<(%p,%p)", &os, &m)
00284 
00285                 os << *(m.header) << m.rfc822;
00286 
00287                 return os;
00288                 }
00289 
00290         // DEBUG
00291 
00292 #ifdef DEBUG
00293         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00294 #endif
00295 
00296 protected:
00297         UMimeEntity rfc822;
00298 
00299 private:
00300         UMimeMessage(const UMimeMessage&) : UMimeEntity() {}
00301         UMimeMessage& operator=(const UMimeMessage&)              { return *this; }
00302 };

00304 // If the content type is 'multipart' then the body contains one or more body parts.
00305 
00306 class U_EXPORT UMimeMultipart : public UMimeEntity {
00307 private:
00308         void init()
00309                 {
00310                 boundary = UMimeHeader::getBoundary(content_type);
00311 
00312                 (void) parse();
00313                 }
00314 public:
00315         // COSTRUTTORI
00316 
00317         UMimeMultipart() : UMimeEntity()
00318                 {
00319                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeMultipart, "", 0)
00320                 }
00321 
00322         UMimeMultipart(UMimeEntity& item) : UMimeEntity(item)
00323                 {
00324                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeMultipart, "%p", &item)
00325 
00326                 U_ASSERT(UMimeEntity::isMultipart())
00327 
00328                 init();
00329                 }
00330 
00331         UMimeMultipart(const UString& _data) : UMimeEntity(_data)
00332                 {
00333                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeMultipart, "%.*S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(_data))
00334 
00335                 init();
00336                 }
00337 
00338         ~UMimeMultipart();
00339 
00340         // VARIE
00341 
00342         bool parse();
00343 
00344         void setContent(const UString& _content)
00345                 {
00346                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeMultipart::setContent(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(_content))
00347 
00348                 U_ASSERT(_content.empty() == false)
00349 
00350                 UMimeEntity::content = _content;
00351                 }
00352 
00353         void setBoundary(const UString& _boundary)
00354                 {
00355                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeMultipart::setBoundary(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(_boundary))
00356 
00357                 U_ASSERT(_boundary.empty() == false)
00358 
00359                 boundary = _boundary;
00360                 }
00361 
00362         UString getBoundary() const { return boundary; }
00363         UString getPreamble() const { return preamble; } 
00364         UString getEpilogue() const { return epilogue; }
00365 
00366         bool isDigest() const { return isType(U_CONSTANT_TO_PARAM("digest")); }
00367 
00368         // manage parts
00369 
00370         uint32_t getNumBodyPart() const             { return bodypart.size(); }
00371 
00372         UMimeEntity* operator[](uint32_t pos) const { return bodypart.at(pos); }
00373 
00374         UVector<UMimeEntity*>& getBodyPart() { return bodypart; }

00376         // STREAM
00377 
00378         friend U_EXPORT ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const UMimeMultipart& ml);
00379 
00380         // DEBUG
00381 
00382 #ifdef DEBUG
00383         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00384 #endif
00385 
00386 protected:
00387         const char* buf;
00388         const char* bbuf;
00389         uint32_t blen, endPos, boundaryStart, boundaryEnd;
00390         UString boundary, preamble, epilogue;
00391         UVector<UMimeEntity*> bodypart;
00392         bool isFinal;
00393 
00394                                           bool findBoundary(uint32_t pos) U_NO_EXPORT;
00395         static inline bool isOnlyWhiteSpaceOrDashesUntilEndOfLine(const char* current, const char* end) U_NO_EXPORT;
00396
